data.name: Gang wars
data.detailed_description:
It's a gangster's world, the one who shoots faster lives longer. So, move, move, move and shoot, shoot, shoot.

Your task is to kill all enemies and collect money. More money you collect, more bullets you can buy.
More levels you pass, better weapon you get.
It sounds very simple, but when you start playing you will see that it is not so easy.
With each wave come more gangsters, they move faster and are better equipped, so you should be really good to survive!

Features:
+ 40 levels
+ 13 characters (1 main character and 12 enemies)
+ 4 weapon types, grenades and bombs
+ earn money while killing enemies
+ funny animation
+ upgrade gun power and the barricade in Shop system

So, load your gun and start your gangster war!

data.short_description: Gang wars - shoot faster, live longer!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor like i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
